snippet.title: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle [English Trailer]
snippet.description:
Arc System Works USA is proud to announce that BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle will offer gamers dual audio options! The English dub finally unveils itself to the world, including the first ever English voice actors for characters from French Bread's Under Night In-Birth series.
__________
BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle is AVAILABLE NOW on PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and Steam!

Collector's Edition:
Arc System Works GEAR (PS4) - https://store.arcsystemworks.com/collections/frontpage/products/blazblue-cross-tag-battle-collectors-edition-playstation-4
Arc System Works GEAR (Switch) - https://store.arcsystemworks.com/collections/frontpage/products/blazblue-cross-tag-battle-collectors-edition-nintendo-switch
Rooster Teeth Store (PS4) - https://store.roosterteeth.com/collections/rwby/products/collectors-edition-blazblue-cross-tag-battle-ps4-video-game
Rooster Teeth Store (Switch) - https://store.roosterteeth.com/collections/rwby/products/collectors-edition-blazblue-cross-tag-battle-nintendo-switch-video-game

Standard Edition:
Amazon (PS4) - https://www.amazon.com/BlazBlue-Cross-Tag-Battle-PlayStation-4/dp/B079W4F27Y/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1520449242&sr=8-1&keywords=blazblue+cross+tag+battle
Amazon (Switch) - https://www.amazon.com/BlazBlue-Cross-Tag-Battle-Nintendo-Switch/dp/B079Y7H7YF/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1520449242&sr=8-2&keywords=blazblue+cross+tag+battle
Gamestop (PS4) - https://www.gamestop.com/ps4/games/blazblue-cross-tag-battle/159264
GameStop (Switch) - https://www.gamestop.com/nintendo-switch/games/blazblue-cross-tag-battle/159263
PlayStation Store - https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0036-CUSA11192_00-BBTAGPS400001000
Nintendo eShop - https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/blazblue-cross-tag-battle-switch
__________
